Kid-friendly Cape Cod destinations

The two most dreaded words children can utter on vacation are: “I’m bored!” When the typical answer, “How can you be bored? We’re on vacation!” results in only more whining and moping, you may wish you had planned your trip with some kid-friendly activities in mind.
